root.name: Bomberman
root.description: Single Player The single player mode plays much like the original Bomberman for the NES. There are 10 worlds in the game each that consists of 10 stages, one bonus stage, and one boss each. A new feature to this game is the item screen. All items that you collect are added to your stock and can be used my touching that item on the touch screen to power up.Multiplayer The multiplayer uses both screens to expand the area during matches. Just like other Bomberman games, it includes the Revenge setting and the Super Revenge setting. One feature in the Multiplayer is that you can play with eight players with just one game card.
